views.markdown:
Reo! Fancy dancy player

Letâ€™s keep things simple, a music player 4 lock screen perfectly working with all versions of Spotify/AppleMusic fully supporting iPhones running iOS 14.0 to 17 (not iPads yet).



Video showcasing here!



INCLUDING:

Three different player coloring styles:

Light Mode: White text/icon for lightmode users

Dark Mode: Black text/icon for darkmode users

ColorFlow: adopts everything to artwork color

Minimized/Maximized/Dismissed player on LS. (tap on artwork to move between and to dismiss tap the dismiss icon on minimized)

Offset/Size/Corner radius/Blur/Border/Blur/Background all customizable on preferences

Set playing artwork as LS background - 3 different blur options (background artwork switch needs a userspace reboot!)

Fully animated interface (satisfying animations fr)

Now-playing device icon and name with airplay button

Glass effect for uielements like what apple did on iOS 17

COMPATIBILITY:

rootful-rootless palera1n and xina dopamine1-2 and seretonin!



Tested devices:

iPhone 14 pro 16.5.1 Serotonin

iPhone 13 16.1.0 Dopamine 2

iPhone 13 15.0 Xina 2

iPhone 12 14.6 Taurine

iPhone 8 15.5 Palera1n

iPhone 6s+ 15.7.7 Palera1n

You can combine Reo with other tweaks like Exiwall (thanks to FoxFort), Lastlook(thanks to anthopak), Designer, Nexus, Mitsuha Forever, Axon, Complications, Jade, Lunar, Veza, Tako, Jellyfish, Velvet etc with no conflicts!



Contact me if you have any problem or suggestion! through www.mysteryexe.xyz or discord support: Discord.com



Please don't crack this bc it's like my first ever tweak :<
views.title: markdown-description

views.markdown:
• New Glass Effect for UIElements!
  • New Fading animations for artwork & Timeline
  • New background blur method + Grain effect
  • Compatibility with Axon/Veza & etc
  • Fixed issues with Jade
  • Added Nowplaying app icon
  • Fixed artwork not showing up sometimes
  • Timeline removed for ios16
  • Added Option to set artwork size to 0 and make it completely invisible
  • Added customizable auto dismiss timeout (0 - 60s)

• Added NEW COLORFLOW Style!
  • Added GESTURES so no more pain!
  • Removed Oldabi and compiled with Newabi!
  • Finally hiding default player on ios16!!111!!11!1
  • New Glitch effect when changing track (requsted lol, it has a switch).
  • Remade the whole preferences file
  • Fixed Lunar and any other ls support which had problem
  • Airplay button now actually shows the ios airplay device selection view if you tap
  • Added alot of options for frames/backgrounds
  • Fixed dismiss button not being in the center of screen
  • New blur style added
  • Notifications are now animated when they disappear/appear
  • Fixed artist label going into airplay button
  • as always new banner/icon

• Fixed notifications going under artwork
  • Added more customizations to preferences
  • Adaptations for notched devices
